name: InterTwined (Alex Davies)
description:
You are a cute cat, but you've lost your way home, so you must use the power of the mystic balls of twine to make your way home. 

In this platformer, everything takes place in a single space - a single screen - yet who’s to say that two things can exist in the same space? As such, you must traverse the multiple intertwined (pun intended) dimensions in order to find your home.

This game was made for the Game Maker's Tool Kit 2019 Game Jam, with the theme 'only one'.

I didn't get time to add a menu screen or ending, so the game just closes after finishing. I'm going to continue updating the game after the jam is complete, but I will keep a download link to the original submission.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space -Jump

E - Interact
